content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":257932,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らは別世界から漂着した異星人","translatedEnglishLine":"They are aliens who drifted here from another world."},{"lineNumber":257933,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱暴者のランスに早く出て行って欲しいので","translatedEnglishLine":"Because they want the violent Rance to leave quickly,"},{"lineNumber":257934,"originalJapaneseLine":"巨大戦艦遺跡で聖女を捜すのに協力している","translatedEnglishLine":"They are cooperating in searching for the saint in the giant battleship ruins."},{"lineNumber":257935,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人サテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Satella."},{"lineNumber":257936,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスを殺す為に同行していると本人は言っているが…","translatedEnglishLine":"She says she is accompanying them to kill Rance, but..."},{"lineNumber":257937,"originalJapaneseLine":"本当はランスの事が気になってしかたがなくモヤモヤ","translatedEnglishLine":"The truth is, she can't stop worrying about Rance and feels restless."},{"lineNumber":257938,"originalJapaneseLine":"■ホルスの食料庫■","translatedEnglishLine":"■Horus' Food Storage■"},{"lineNumber":257939,"originalJapaneseLine":"偵察に出ていた\"かなみ\"が罠に捕まっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami, who went on a reconnaissance mission, was caught in a trap."},{"lineNumber":257940,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルス達の昔話","translatedEnglishLine":"The old tale of Horus and company."},{"lineNumber":257941,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・何千年も前にココに墜落した移民団の生き残り","translatedEnglishLine":"- Survivors of an immigrant group that crashed here thousands of years ago."},{"lineNumber":257942,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・コールドスリープ装置を使い生き長らえ","translatedEnglishLine":"- They survived by using cold sleep devices."},{"lineNumber":257943,"originalJapaneseLine":"　・女王テラを捜している","translatedEnglishLine":"- They are searching for Queen Terra."},{"lineNumber":257944,"originalJapaneseLine":"■コールドスリープ室の前■","translatedEnglishLine":"■In front of the cold sleep chamber■"},{"lineNumber":257945,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルス達は中に入れまいとするが","translatedEnglishLine":"Horus and the others try to prevent entry,"},{"lineNumber":257946,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは押し通る","translatedEnglishLine":"but Rance pushes his way through."},{"lineNumber":257947,"originalJapaneseLine":"コールドスリープ室で\"聖女モンスターセラクロラス\"を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"In the cold sleep chamber, they discover the 'Saint Monster Seracloras'."},{"lineNumber":257948,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ランスが期待と違い幼女だった","translatedEnglishLine":"However, contrary to Rance's expectations, she was a little girl."},{"lineNumber":257949,"originalJapaneseLine":"セラクロラスはどこかへ行ってしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Seracloras disappears somewhere."},{"lineNumber":257950,"originalJapaneseLine":"このコールドスリープ室のどこかに","translatedEnglishLine":"Somewhere in this cold sleep chamber,"},{"lineNumber":257951,"originalJapaneseLine":"女王テラ、殺人鬼ジャハルッカスが眠っている","translatedEnglishLine":"Queen Terra and the murderer Jahalkkus are sleeping."},{"lineNumber":257952,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを聞くとランスはコールドスープ装置を開けまくる","translatedEnglishLine":"Upon hearing that, Rance starts opening the cold sleep devices one after another."},{"lineNumber":257953,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":257954,"originalJapaneseLine":"大型の家族用コールドスリープ装置を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"They discover a large family-sized cold sleep device."},{"lineNumber":257955,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは面白半分で中に入るが、うっかり装置が作動","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance enters it for fun, but accidentally activates the device."},{"lineNumber":257956,"originalJapaneseLine":"コールドスリープ状態にされてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"He is put into a state of cold sleep."},{"lineNumber":257957,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がコールドスリープ装置に入って３ヶ月が過ぎ去った","translatedEnglishLine":"Three months have passed since Rance and the others entered the cold sleep devices."},{"lineNumber":257958,"originalJapaneseLine":"久し振りに集まったホルス達は開けるかどうか検討する","translatedEnglishLine":"Horus and the others gather after a long time to consider whether to open them."},{"lineNumber":257959,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルス達は開けない事にした","translatedEnglishLine":"Horus and the others decide not to open them."},{"lineNumber":257960,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がコールドスリープ装置に入って３年が過ぎた","translatedEnglishLine":"Three years have passed since Rance and the others entered the cold sleep devices."},{"lineNumber":257961,"originalJapaneseLine":"久し振りに集まったホルス達は開けるかどうか検討する","translatedEnglishLine":"Horus and the others gather after a long time to consider whether to open them."},{"lineNumber":257962,"originalJapaneseLine":"■３年後の世界……■","translatedEnglishLine":"■The World Three Years Later...■"},{"lineNumber":257963,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界は魔王ケイブリスに支配され","translatedEnglishLine":"The world is ruled by the Demon King Kavebris."},{"lineNumber":257964,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類は奴隷として悲惨な扱いを受けていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Humanity is treated terribly as slaves."},{"lineNumber":257965,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の逃亡生活が始まった","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others begin a life on the run."},{"lineNumber":257966,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<GAME OVER>"},{"lineNumber":257967,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルス達は開けない事にした","translatedEnglishLine":"Horus and the others decide not to open them."},{"lineNumber":257968,"originalJapaneseLine":"■５万年後の世界…■","translatedEnglishLine":"■The World 50,000 Years Later...■"},{"lineNumber":257969,"originalJapaneseLine":"すでにメインプレイヤーは人類からイカマンに変わっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"By then, the main players had changed from humans to squid-men."},{"lineNumber":257970,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は人類を率いて聖戦を開始する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others lead humanity and start a holy war."},{"lineNumber":257971,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<GAME OVER>"},{"lineNumber":257972,"originalJapaneseLine":"３ヶ月の時を経てコールドスリープが解除され","translatedEnglishLine":"After three months, the cold sleep is awaken."},{"lineNumber":257974,"originalJapaneseLine":"無数にあるコールドスリープ装置のどこかにいる女王テラを","translatedEnglishLine":"To awaken Queen Terra, who is in one of the countless cold sleep devices,"},{"lineNumber":257975,"originalJapaneseLine":"起こす為に再びカプセルを開けまくるランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance once again opens many capsules to try to wake her."},{"lineNumber":257976,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、テラではなく殺人鬼ジャハルッカスを起こしてしまった","translatedEnglishLine":"However, instead of Terra, he awakens the murderer Jahalkkus."},{"lineNumber":257977,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中割り込み、第２ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle interrupt, 2nd turn."},{"lineNumber":257978,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラが参加する、みてられん、手助けしてやる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella joins in. Unbearable to watch, so I'll help."},{"lineNumber":257979,"originalJapaneseLine":"こいつだけだけだからな、今後も別に手伝う訳じゃないぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm only helping this one time, not going to assist anymore in the future."},{"lineNumber":257980,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中割り込み、第4ターン","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle interrupt, 4th turn."},{"lineNumber":257981,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様、ちょっと待って下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Rance, please wait a moment."},{"lineNumber":257982,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジャハルッカスの様子が変です、何か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Jahalkkus is acting strange, something is..."},{"lineNumber":257983,"originalJapaneseLine":"うむ、大技でも繰り出してきそうな気配だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, it feels like he's about to unleash a powerful move."},{"lineNumber":257984,"originalJapaneseLine":"はい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes."},{"lineNumber":257985,"originalJapaneseLine":"（かなみの手裏剣でぴよらせるか・・いや、成功確率が低いな","translatedEnglishLine":"(Should I try to stun him with Kanami's shuriken...? No, the success rate is low."},{"lineNumber":257986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それとも大技を出させる前に倒すか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Or should I defeat him before he uses his big move..."},{"lineNumber":257987,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、確実に防御してしのぐか・・）","translatedEnglishLine":"No, should I reliably defend and endure...)"},{"lineNumber":257988,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中割り込み、ジャハルッカスの体力が２５％以下","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle interrupt, Jahalkkus' health drops below 25%."},{"lineNumber":257989,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐぐぐ、何故だ・・私は無敵の殺人鬼、負けるはずなど・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Grrr, why... I am the invincible murderer, I should never lose..."},{"lineNumber":257990,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホルス達の歓声、すごい、やっぱこの人間はただ者ではない","translatedEnglishLine":"The cheers from Horus and the others are amazing. As expected, this human is no ordinary person."},{"lineNumber":257991,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、ここまでだなジャハなんとか、俺がかっこよく止めをさしてやる","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, this is where it ends, Jahasomething. I'll deliver the finishing blow in style."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは別世界から漂着した異星人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are aliens who drifted here from another world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱暴者のランスに早く出て行って欲しいので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because they want the violent Rance to leave quickly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大戦艦遺跡で聖女を捜すのに協力している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are cooperating in searching for the saint in the giant battleship ruins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを殺す為に同行していると本人は言っているが…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she is accompanying them to kill Rance, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当はランスの事が気になってしかたがなくモヤモヤ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The truth is, she can't stop worrying about Rance and feels restless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■ホルスの食料庫■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■Horus' Food Storage■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偵察に出ていた"かなみ"が罠に捕まっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, who went on a reconnaissance mission, was caught in a trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達の昔話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old tale of Horus and company.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・何千年も前にココに墜落した移民団の生き残り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Survivors of an immigrant group that crashed here thousands of years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・コールドスリープ装置を使い生き長らえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They survived by using cold sleep devices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・女王テラを捜している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They are searching for Queen Terra.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■コールドスリープ室の前■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■In front of the cold sleep chamber■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達は中に入れまいとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others try to prevent entry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは押し通る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Rance pushes his way through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ室で"聖女モンスターセラクロラス"を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the cold sleep chamber, they discover the 'Saint Monster Seracloras'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスが期待と違い幼女だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, contrary to Rance's expectations, she was a little girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスはどこかへ行ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras disappears somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このコールドスリープ室のどこかに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere in this cold sleep chamber,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女王テラ、殺人鬼ジャハルッカスが眠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Queen Terra and the murderer Jahalkkus are sleeping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを聞くとランスはコールドスープ装置を開けまくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon hearing that, Rance starts opening the cold sleep devices one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大型の家族用コールドスリープ装置を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They discover a large family-sized cold sleep device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは面白半分で中に入るが、うっかり装置が作動
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance enters it for fun, but accidentally activates the device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ状態にされてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is put into a state of cold sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がコールドスリープ装置に入って３ヶ月が過ぎ去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three months have passed since Rance and the others entered the cold sleep devices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久し振りに集まったホルス達は開けるかどうか検討する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others gather after a long time to consider whether to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達は開けない事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others decide not to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がコールドスリープ装置に入って３年が過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three years have passed since Rance and the others entered the cold sleep devices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久し振りに集まったホルス達は開けるかどうか検討する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others gather after a long time to consider whether to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■３年後の世界……■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■The World Three Years Later...■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界は魔王ケイブリスに支配され
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world is ruled by the Demon King Kavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類は奴隷として悲惨な扱いを受けていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity is treated terribly as slaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の逃亡生活が始まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others begin a life on the run.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <GAME OVER>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達は開けない事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others decide not to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■５万年後の世界…■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■The World 50,000 Years Later...■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにメインプレイヤーは人類からイカマンに変わっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By then, the main players had changed from humans to squid-men.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は人類を率いて聖戦を開始する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others lead humanity and start a holy war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <GAME OVER>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３ヶ月の時を経てコールドスリープが解除され
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After three months, the cold sleep is deactivated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 蘇るランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rance and the others awaken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無数にあるコールドスリープ装置のどこかにいる女王テラを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To awaken Queen Terra, who is in one of the countless cold sleep devices,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起こす為に再びカプセルを開けまくるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance once again opens many capsules to try to wake her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、テラではなく殺人鬼ジャハルッカスを起こしてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, instead of Terra, he awakens the murderer Jahalkkus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中割り込み、第２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interrupt, 2nd turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが参加する、みてられん、手助けしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella joins in. Unbearable to watch, so I'll help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつだけだけだからな、今後も別に手伝う訳じゃないぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm only helping this one time, not going to assist anymore in the future.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中割り込み、第4ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interrupt, 4th turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ちょっと待って下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, please wait a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャハルッカスの様子が変です、何か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jahalkkus is acting strange, something is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、大技でも繰り出してきそうな気配だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, it feels like he's about to unleash a powerful move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （かなみの手裏剣でぴよらせるか・・いや、成功確率が低いな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Should I try to stun him with Kanami's shuriken...? No, the success rate is low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも大技を出させる前に倒すか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or should I defeat him before he uses his big move...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、確実に防御してしのぐか・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, should I reliably defend and endure...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中割り込み、ジャハルッカスの体力が２５％以下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interrupt, Jahalkkus' health drops below 25%.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぐぐ、何故だ・・私は無敵の殺人鬼、負けるはずなど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grrr, why... I am the invincible murderer, I should never lose...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達の歓声、すごい、やっぱこの人間はただ者ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cheers from Horus and the others are amazing. As expected, this human is no ordinary person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、ここまでだなジャハなんとか、俺がかっこよく止めをさしてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, this is where it ends, Jahasomething. I'll deliver the finishing blow in style.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは別世界から漂着した異星人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are aliens who drifted here from another world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱暴者のランスに早く出て行って欲しいので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because they want the violent Rance to leave quickly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大戦艦遺跡で聖女を捜すのに協力している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are cooperating in searching for the saint in the giant battleship ruins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人サテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Satella.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを殺す為に同行していると本人は言っているが…
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She says she is accompanying them to kill Rance, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当はランスの事が気になってしかたがなくモヤモヤ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The truth is, she can't stop worrying about Rance and feels restless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■ホルスの食料庫■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■Horus' Food Storage■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偵察に出ていた"かなみ"が罠に捕まっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, who went on a reconnaissance mission, was caught in a trap.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達の昔話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The old tale of Horus and company.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・何千年も前にココに墜落した移民団の生き残り
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - Survivors of an immigrant group that crashed here thousands of years ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・コールドスリープ装置を使い生き長らえ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They survived by using cold sleep devices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・女王テラを捜している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: - They are searching for Queen Terra.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■コールドスリープ室の前■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■In front of the cold sleep chamber■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達は中に入れまいとするが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others try to prevent entry,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは押し通る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Rance pushes his way through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ室で"聖女モンスターセラクロラス"を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the cold sleep chamber, they discover the 'Saint Monster Seracloras'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ランスが期待と違い幼女だった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, contrary to Rance's expectations, she was a little girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セラクロラスはどこかへ行ってしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seracloras disappears somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このコールドスリープ室のどこかに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Somewhere in this cold sleep chamber,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女王テラ、殺人鬼ジャハルッカスが眠っている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Queen Terra and the murderer Jahalkkus are sleeping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを聞くとランスはコールドスープ装置を開けまくる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Upon hearing that, Rance starts opening the cold sleep devices one after another.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大型の家族用コールドスリープ装置を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They discover a large family-sized cold sleep device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは面白半分で中に入るが、うっかり装置が作動
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance enters it for fun, but accidentally activates the device.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コールドスリープ状態にされてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He is put into a state of cold sleep.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がコールドスリープ装置に入って３ヶ月が過ぎ去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three months have passed since Rance and the others entered the cold sleep devices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久し振りに集まったホルス達は開けるかどうか検討する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others gather after a long time to consider whether to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達は開けない事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others decide not to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がコールドスリープ装置に入って３年が過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Three years have passed since Rance and the others entered the cold sleep devices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 久し振りに集まったホルス達は開けるかどうか検討する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others gather after a long time to consider whether to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■３年後の世界……■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■The World Three Years Later...■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界は魔王ケイブリスに支配され
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The world is ruled by the Demon King Kavebris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類は奴隷として悲惨な扱いを受けていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity is treated terribly as slaves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達の逃亡生活が始まった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others begin a life on the run.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <GAME OVER>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達は開けない事にした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Horus and the others decide not to open them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ■５万年後の世界…■
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ■The World 50,000 Years Later...■

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにメインプレイヤーは人類からイカマンに変わっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By then, the main players had changed from humans to squid-men.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は人類を率いて聖戦を開始する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others lead humanity and start a holy war.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＧＡＭＥＯＶＥＲ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <GAME OVER>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ３ヶ月の時を経てコールドスリープが解除され
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After three months, the cold sleep is deactivated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 蘇るランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rance and the others awaken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無数にあるコールドスリープ装置のどこかにいる女王テラを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To awaken Queen Terra, who is in one of the countless cold sleep devices,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起こす為に再びカプセルを開けまくるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance once again opens many capsules to try to wake her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、テラではなく殺人鬼ジャハルッカスを起こしてしまった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, instead of Terra, he awakens the murderer Jahalkkus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中割り込み、第２ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interrupt, 2nd turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラが参加する、みてられん、手助けしてやる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella joins in. Unbearable to watch, so I'll help.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こいつだけだけだからな、今後も別に手伝う訳じゃないぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm only helping this one time, not going to assist anymore in the future.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中割り込み、第4ターン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interrupt, 4th turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、ちょっと待って下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Rance, please wait a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジャハルッカスの様子が変です、何か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Jahalkkus is acting strange, something is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、大技でも繰り出してきそうな気配だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, it feels like he's about to unleash a powerful move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （かなみの手裏剣でぴよらせるか・・いや、成功確率が低いな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Should I try to stun him with Kanami's shuriken...? No, the success rate is low.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それとも大技を出させる前に倒すか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or should I defeat him before he uses his big move...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、確実に防御してしのぐか・・）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, should I reliably defend and endure...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中割り込み、ジャハルッカスの体力が２５％以下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle interrupt, Jahalkkus' health drops below 25%.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぐぐ、何故だ・・私は無敵の殺人鬼、負けるはずなど・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grrr, why... I am the invincible murderer, I should never lose...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホルス達の歓声、すごい、やっぱこの人間はただ者ではない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cheers from Horus and the others are amazing. As expected, this human is no ordinary person.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、ここまでだなジャハなんとか、俺がかっこよく止めをさしてやる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, this is where it ends, Jahasomething. I'll deliver the finishing blow in style.
